text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/binding-style defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
FHIR FHIRBinding uses system(uri)+version+code+display (or just code or for Quantity, system+code+unit). This is the default for the FHIR Tools
RIM RIMBinding uses codeSystem(oid)+codeSystemName+codeSystemVersion+valueSet+valueSetVersion+code+displayName
CDA CDABinding uses codeSystem(oid)+codeSystemName+codeSystemVersion+sdtcValueSet+sdtcValueSetVersion+code+displayName
V2 v2Value is to CNE/CWE types as defined in V2 R2.8
openEHR openEHRBinding is to openEHR DV_CODED_TEXT (?)

name: VocabBindingStyles
title: Vocab Binding Style Codes
description: How the data type is bound to vocabulary

concept.definition: Binding uses system(uri)+version+code+display (or just code or for Quantity, system+code+unit). This is the default for the FHIR Tools
Value is to CNE/CWE types as defined in V2 R2.8
